title: Arman ja viimeinen ristiretki
overview: Arman travels with an open mind and curiosity to the ends of the world, from where he brings viewers eight different and super-big adventures, the likes of which have not been seen before. The overarching theme of the series is how the old and new world meet. On his travels, Arman asks how the traditions, beliefs and customs of the past world sit in the light of today and especially the future.
